actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 97-191.
Called up by House on Call of Consent Calendar.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure S.547 (Amended) Passed House in Lieu.

official_title: A bill to enable the Secretary of the Interior to erect permanent improvements on land acquired for the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Attorney General to approve any conveyance to the United States of specified land acquired for the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon, provided such conveyance incorporates the terms of an agreement entered into by such Tribes, the United States, and the city of Siletz, Oregon. Permits the Secretary of the Interior or such Confederated Tribes to erect improvements on such land after conveyance to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to enable the Secretary of the Interior to erect permanent improvements on land acquired for the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon.
